usage_rules: Headings must be Manrope. Use tight tracking (-0.02em) for sizes above 24px.
Body text must be Inter. Use relaxed line-height (1.6) for readability.
Numbers (Balances, Rates) must use Manrope for tabular lining figures.
NEVER use Inter for main headings (h1, h2).

layout.grid_system: Use 'Bento' style grids. Avoid equal-width columns everywhere. Mix 2/3 + 1/3 splits.
layout.spacing: Use generous padding (py-12, py-24) for marketing sections. Compact (p-4, p-6) for dashboard widgets.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-white hover:bg-primary/90 shadow-lg hover:shadow-primary/20 rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-bold transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-stone-900 border border-stone-200 hover:bg-stone-50 hover:border-primary/30 rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-medium transition-all
buttons.ghost: text-stone-600 hover:text-primary hover:bg-orange-50 rounded-lg px-4 py-2 transition-colors

cards.dashboard: bg-white dark:bg-stone-900 border border-stone-200 dark:border-stone-800 rounded-xl p-6 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-shadow
cards.feature: group relative overflow-hidden bg-stone-50 dark:bg-stone-900 rounded-2xl p-8 border border-stone-200 hover:border-primary/50 transition-colors

inputs.default: bg-white dark:bg-stone-950 border-stone-200 dark:border-stone-800 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-primary/20 focus:border-primary rounded-lg h-11

media.image_style: Warm, authentic, high-contrast. Avoid cool blue filters. Use golden hour lighting.
media.icons: Lucide React. Use stroke-width={1.5} for a refined look.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. THEME OVERRIDE: The current project is set to BLUE (#0047AB). You MUST override this. Update tailwind.config.js to use the Orange/Warm palette defined above.
2. LOGO: Since no logo image is provided, create a text-based logo component: 'KAYI' (Bold/Primary Color) + 'COM' (Light/Secondary) with a small orange dot or accent.
3. CURRENCY: Always display HTG and USD. If a value is in HTG, show (~$USD) next to it in smaller muted text.
4. DASHBOARD: Use the 'Bento' grid layout. The 'Total Balance' card should be the hero (largest).
5. AFFILIATE: Make the 'Refer & Earn' section prominent with Gold/Yellow accents to signify rewards.
6. NAVIGATION: Sidebar for Desktop, Bottom Tab Bar for Mobile.
7. DATA-TESTID: Add data-testid to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, links).
universal_guidelines: Do not use generic centered layouts.
Create depth through layered design elements.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Never use AI assistant Emoji characters.
